title: Back Bay central
posting_body: The best location in the city!
This apartment is located on sleepy residential Marlborough Street, near everything and still quiet.
It is in a professionally managed building and has hardwood floors throughout, exposed brick, and an open kitchen.
Heat and hot water are included in the rent and laundry facilities are in the building.

This apartment is located within a beautiful Back Bay brownstone close to many of Boston's most loved attractions including: Public Gardens, Charles River, Copley Place, Prudential Center, Boston Public Library, John Hancock Tower, Hynes Convention Center, Newbury St, Boylston Street, Commonwealth Avenue, Massachusetts Turnpike, Berklee College of Music, Boston Architectural College, New England College of Optometry, MIT, and BU.
It is also convenient to Trader Joe's, Shopping, Restaurants, and Public transportation-
Arlington (Green Line), Copley (Green Line), Hynes Convention Center (Green Line), Back Bay station (Orange Line/MBTA Commuter Rail)
WE ACCEPT VISA MASTERCARD & AMERICAN EXPRESS
